title: Harden steps it up, Joker MVP
description:
Jalen & Jacoby discuss this weekend’s NBA action. James Harden is back to his usual self as he puts up 31 points in the 76ers game 4 win over the Miami Heat. The series is tied as it heads back to Miami, find out what needs to happen for Philly to keep the momentum going. Also, the Joker wins back-back MVPS. Do the guys agree with that decision or should it have been someone else? Plus, CP3 fouls out during the Suns loss that evens out the series. After an altercation at the end of the game, find out where Chris Paul’s headspace is after game 4 and what that means for the next two games. And Kendrick Lamar uses deepfake during his latest music video. Find out what the guys think about rapping as Kobe, Nipsey Hussle and many others. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
